channel.title: [Delta 317] Making Items 2 Handed
channel.description:
The Godswords on my server are weld as one handed.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lbc67n.jpg[/img]
How can I change it so they hold the Godsword like a 2h weapon?
EDIT: The item itself is a two handed weapon, I just need to change the animations so it looks like a two handed weapon.

item.title: [Delta 317] Making Items 2 Handed
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

i dont think so, try copying it from a 317 that has the animations correct, the animations should be in getstandanim, getwalkanim and and getrunanim

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Making Items 2 Handed
item.dc:creator: @homerunhitta977 homerunhitta977
item.description:
@homerunhitta977 wrote:

The item itself is already a two handed weapon, I just want the anims to be changed so it looks like he is holding it with two hands… is this possible on a 317 delta?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Making Items 2 Handed
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

\src\server\model\items

Code:
/**
*two handed weapon check
**/
public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) {
if(itemName.contains(“karil”) || itemName.contains(“verac”) || itemName.contains(“guthan”) || itemName.contains(“dharok”) || itemName.contains(“torag”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“longbow”) || itemName.contains(“shortbow”) || itemName.contains(“ark bow”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“crystal”)) {
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“godsword”) || itemName.contains(“anchor”) || itemName.contains(“claws”) || itemName.contains(“aradomin sword”) || itemName.contains(“2h”) || itemName.contains(“spear”)){
return true;
}
switch(itemId) {
case 6724: // seercull
case 11730:
case 4153:
case 6528:
case 1853:
case 14484:
case 6527:
case 18353:
return true;
}
return false;
}

Read full topic
